results.title: Missed bin collections – London Borough of Harrow
results.snippet: Unfortunately, not all bin collections are successful on bin days. Find out how you can report a missed bin online.

selected_links.title: Missed bin collections – London Borough of Harrow
strengths: Directly addresses council customer's need for information on missed bin collections
Offers online reporting of missed bin collections
selected_links.reasoning: This link provides a specific page dedicated to missed bin collections and offers the option to report a missed bin collection online, making it highly relevant.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The content explains the common reasons for missed bin collections, but it does not provide a clear method for reporting a missed collection or requesting a pickup for a missed collection.
Reason.next_actions: Contact Harrow Council directly through their contact information (phone, email, or online form) to report a missed collection.

analysis.overall_assessment: While the content provides useful information about common reasons for missed bin collections, it does not adequately address the need of reporting and requesting a pickup for a missed collection. As a Council Resident, I would find it more helpful if clear instructions on how to report a missed collection were included within this content.
